thread.section_title: Premier Dead Sea USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premier Dead Sea USA | www.premierdeadsea-usa.com
thread.title: Tracy
thread.title_full: Premier Dead Sea USA reviewed by Tracy

author: Tracy
title: Tracy
text: I am 51 and have used just about every product out there but this product gives real results. I have very sensitive skin to but this product does not trigger any itching or rash. I will be a customer a long time. I had my first online buying experience and experienced a little delay from damage caused in shipping but all was solved promptly and I was rewarded with bonus samples for the delay. I love the samples I was provided and will be looking at those next. I'm so excited about this product that I'm got my daughters to try it. They do not have aging skin like me but felt the product did so much for their skin that they are now hooked.
